title: SNEAK PREVIEW PRESENTER TRAINING FINAL ASSESSMENT
description: In an effort to assess your accomplishment during the past four days of training, this assessment is meant to help you see what you have learned about Eclipse and RJ Reynolds and what else you need to work on in order to facilitate successful Sneak Previews.
instructions: These questions have been asked of you each morning, so nothing should surprise you. Relax and take your time.

questions.question: Eclipse has more than a 90% reduction in second-hand smoke.
Eclipse produces no lingering odor, no ashes, and practically no staining.
There are currently 4 styles of Eclipse cigarettes.
